description: Try our easy to follow Sesame-Crusted Roast Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sesame-Crusted Roast Pork Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190Â°C. Combine soy, honey, garlic, ginger, sesame oil and plum sauce in a small saucepan. Mix well to combine. Brush liberally all over the pork loin.
Place sesame seeds in a flat dish and roll pork in seeds until coated. Transfer to a rack in a roasting pan and add enough water to fill 2cm deep. Roast for 1-11/4 hours or until juices run clear.
Meanwhile, add 1/3 cup water to remaining sauce in pan. Bring to the boil over medium heat and simmer for 5 minutes or until sauce has slightly thickened. Slice pork and serve with warm sauce.
